articles.title: Trump said he wanted impeachment witnesses in the Senate. Now he may block them.
articles.description: For weeks, President Trump said he wanted a Senate trial that included administration officials. Now he says he will defer to the Senate and may invoke executive privilege to block witness testimony.
articles.content:
In November, Trump said he wanted a Senate trial.
